name: Things Unwanted
description:
A dating sim with 4 gorgeous folks who've got issues! Conquer their hearts, or break them, you choose~ 

This game has 11 endings (good endings with cuddles and warm hugs, and bad endings with death, abuse, and heartbreak). It might take about 30 mins to play, I don't really know lol

There may be bugs or issues, but I'll try my best to fix them! 

One day, maybe, I'll add drawings ~_~;;

Thanks for playing <3
